name: Strike
description:
Strike is simple two-dimensional arcade video game. Two players controls paddle and compete against each other. Player win if he get predetermined number of goals.

Game include 4 level to play, and 5 different paddles do controll.

Controls

Keyboard/Xbox 360 controller

  • Player one: WASD or D-Pad
  • Player two: arrows or D-Pad on second controller

Controller support is experimental, and you can't navigate in menu.

Credits
  • Piotr "Porkite" Grobelny - Code, music, "art"
